multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: rates; US inflation expectations and core PCE, Fed policy signals, tariffs, and tech selloff are expected to push UST yields lower by 10‑20bp over the next 3‑6 months, drag S&P 500 down 0.5‑1.2% today, and lift WTI/Brent/Gold/Copper by 0.5‑1% in the short term.
